nodes.text: The Braxant Run was a hyperspace route located in the Outer Rim, the most important of the northern quadrant. The hyperlane began as branch of the Hydian Way at Bandomeer, where it soon passed through the Cassandran Worlds and the Braxant sector before reaching Wild Space. Zabrak scouts kept as a commercial secret their extension of the route into the Unknown Regions.
During the Clone Wars the Braxant Run was frequently used by agricultural freighters operating out of Cassander.[source?]
